Update the describe to use routing convention

Update file spec/controllers/posts_controller_spec.rb

Change 

   describe "GET 'new'" do

To 

   describe 'GET #new' do

Change 

       get 'new'

To 

       get :new

Becomes 

 
 describe PostsController do
 
   describe 'GET #new' do
     it "returns http success" do
       get :new
       response.should be_success
     end
   end
